Package gui.controllers

Class ClientConnectFormController

java.lang.Object
gui.controllers.ClientConnectFormController
public class ClientConnectFormController extends Object
The controller for the client connection form user interface. It manages the connection to the server and transitions to the login screen.

      Parameters:

    • connectToServer

      public void connectToServer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Attempts to connect the client to the server using the IP and port from the input fields. If successful, transitions to the login screen.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the connect button

    • updateClientStatus

      private void updateClientStatus(String message)
      Updates the client status label with the given message.
      Parameters:
      message - the status message to display

    • displayLoginScreen

      public void displayLoginScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Displays the login screen. Hides the current window and shows a new stage with the login UI.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the connect button
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while loading the login screen

    • getExitBtn

      public void getExitBtn()
      Exits the application. Prints a message to the console and then exiting the application.
